id: scenario-value-scanner-senior-scenarios-ecological-bioregional-bioregional food knowledge and local food traditions
title: Bioregional food knowledge and local food traditions
description: Bioregional food knowledge and local food traditions
content:
Scenario: Bioregional food knowledge and local food traditions
    Given Margaret knows local food traditions and seasonal patterns
    And bioregional food culture strengthens local systems
    When the bioregional_elohim supports food culture
    Then Margaret's knowledge of local foods should be valued
    And traditional food practices should be preserved and shared
    And local food culture should be taught to younger generations
    And bioregional identity should be strengthened through food
    And Margaret's cultural food knowledge should serve community
    And food traditions should connect people to place
